originalText.text:
Highly recommend! Best massage and facial experience I‚Äôve ever had. I chose the cranial sacrum massage to relieve neck, shoulder, and lower back pain and tension. The massage got areas of neck pain that I haven‚Äôt previously had addressed during massages - it was a combo of pressure, gentle massage, and a little stretching with some guided movement. It was clear that this place is filled with knowledgeable and skilled staff. The masseuse was attentive, thoughtful, and professional.

I also chose the whitening facial for age spots and imperfections, which included high frequency & extractions. The facial was incredibly thorough as well, and I enjoyed getting a few tips for skincare along the way. I was surprised to get a little neck and face massage along with it, and it was all incredibly relaxing. The entire experience was very professional, and they regularly checked in to make sure temperature, pressure, and comfort levels were to my liking. My skin feels fresh and rejuvenated, and I cannot thank Fifth Ave Thai Spa enough for the wonderful experience. I felt it was an incredible value for the quality of services, and I hope to be back again whenever I am visiting next.

The place is cozy, clean and relaxing. 7 stars! üåü

originalText.text: My visit to the Thai spa was today, and it was a truly rejuvenating experience. The therapist's expertise in massage techniques provided the perfect balance of relaxation and muscle relief. The spa's serene ambiance, combined with the therapist's professionalism, made it a holistic and soothing escape. I highly recommend both the Thai spa and the outstanding services experienced during my visit today. Thank you Patrick this message was revitalizing - you are an amazing therapist!

I highly recommend both the Thai spa and the outstanding services experienced during my visit today. Thank you Patrick this message was revitalizing - you are an amazing therapist!

originalText.text: It was my first time at this spa. I am a therapist  myself, so I know what to look for, and I am not easy to please with the technique.  I had a hot stone massage with Rena.  I highly recommend her. She was very pleasant and knew all the right spots to relax me instantly.  At some point, I even drifted to sleep at the end. I did not want the massage to end. I would recommend a longer session than 1 hr. I would come back to try their thai massage next time.

originalText.text: Went to this spa for the first time. Had an excellent deep tissue massage by Lina and would go back if in the area. Discount if it‚Äôs your first time and if you pay with cash. There are several options for massages but the staff is knowledgeable and can absolutely help!
